channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Base-Metal Demand From Energy Transition to Offset Some China Real-Estate Losses, SMM Says
item.description: Base-metals demand in China will be largely driven by electric vehicles, renewable power, lithium-ion batteries and related infrastructure investment in 2025, offsetting some losses from a weaker property market, the Shanghai Metals Exchange said.

item.title: This obscure indicator with an impressive record has a bullish message for the stock market
item.description: As the ratio rises, the shorter-term outlook for equities gets better and better.

item.title: The Surprise Market Winner of 2024: The Great British Pound
item.description: The pound was mocked as the “Great British Peso” not long ago. Suddenly, it is the best-performing currency in developed markets.

item.title: Oil prices drop, with supply concerns outweighing worries over Middle East
item.description: Oil futures kicked off October and the fourth quarter on a down note, feeling pressure from expectations for increased supply as traders continued to look past an escalation of tensions in the Middle East.

item.title: That 5% CD Is a Great Deal---Until the Bank Calls It Back
item.description: With the Fed cutting interest rates, some savers are learning that there is fine print on their certificates of deposit.

item.title: This hedge-fund manager says it’s a ‘max-long’ moment for stocks
item.description: A ‘cocktail’ of factors lead one investor to get very bullish.

item.title: Euro Stays Weaker Against Dollar After Eurozone Inflation Data
item.description: The euro remained weaker against the dollar after data showed eurozone inflation eased in September as expected.

item.title: ‘I believe she made a big mistake’: My wife put her paycheck into a bank account with her inheritance. Do I now own 50% of those funds?
item.description: “I’m still working, and we’ve always filed joint tax returns.”

item.title: Oil Falls as Increased Supply Prospects Offset Middle East Fears
item.description: Oil prices edged lower in early European trading as prospects of increased supply from OPEC+ offset risks of supply disruptions in the Middle East.

item.title: ‘This money is not bringing me a lot of happiness’: My husband and I have $7 million, but our kids are trouble. Should we cut them off?
item.description: “His son and his wife are not good to us. We rarely see them and they never offer to help us with anything.”
